content:
MemberBindingType Enum

Definition

Describes the binding types that are used in MemberInitExpression objects.

In this Article

public enum MemberBindingType
Inheritance
Object
ValueType
System.Enum
MemberBindingType

Fields

Assignment

A binding that represents initializing a member with the value of an expression.
ListBinding

A binding that represents initializing a member of type IList or stem.Collections.Generic.ICollection`1 from a list of elements.
MemberBinding

A binding that represents recursively initializing members of a member.
